# Loading Data 

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggmosaic)

ChickWeight <- ChickWeight
glimpse(ChickWeight)
summary(ChickWeight)

```


```{r}

weight0 <- ChickWeight %>% group_by(Diet) %>% summarize(nChicks = n(), avgWeight = mean(weight, na.rm = TRUE), sd_weight = sd(weight, na.rm = TRUE))
print(weight0)

```
